title: Bugsplat.dll is missing
body:
What does this mean? I can't start League of Legends because BugSplat is missing? I assume it would be a perfect thing since Bugsplat does nothing but ruin the game by kicking me out and force closing the client.

However, for whatever reason I cannot start this game without downloading it. And how the f**k do I download it? Should I reinstall the entire freaking game agian?

replies.body:
If you're having to patch the game every time you launch it, odds are you're running it from a temporary folder or your files are extremely corrupted. Downloading a ton of files on each launch is abnormal, and a sure sign there's an issue with your install. To resolve this, I strongly recommend you reinstall League using [our Reinstall guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends). Ensure you're installing to the default directory: C:\Riot Games, as many custom directories will cause issues.

Let me know if you have any questions.
